text: 3.14 Ese 11.19, Jol 2.28-29, Sek 12.10, Apo 2.33 Pen Klays kumak ak, binɨb Juda mel okok kɨlop abe dɨnɨg kumak. God Eblaham nop takaw aglɨl agak, Yad gen nad mɨdtep gɨl, binɨb lum okok mɨdupsek abe mɨdtep gɨnɨgabal agak. Anɨb ak nep, Klays Jisas chɨnop nen kumak nɨm, nop gos lɨnɨŋɨd kod mɨdon, God ne Kawnan ne ak yokek apɨl chɨnop bak lup.
